channel.title: Homes on Enrico's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Enrico's Blog

item.description: Biography Enrico is a curious geek. He loves map projections and calendrical algorithms. He sort of likes to tinker with electronics but software is much more malleable and faster, so, due to lack of time, he mainly plays with software.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I am currently, actually always!, thru a learning journey

item.title: Inspirations
item.description: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs (and an interactive version) and Lisp (see “Ancient Text”) Smalltalk: Alan Kay Squeak, Squeakland, SqueakJS olpc Scratch Croquet, OpenQwaq Newspeak Virtual World Framework, Virtual Worlds Python & Co. IPython Notebook, now jupyter Collaborative Calculation in the Cloud (was: SageMath on the Cloud! R, RStudio, tidyverse Inventing fundamental new computing technologies Fonc, Ian’s ee380 at Stanford, To trap a better mouse N.
